message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't guarantee it's high-quality due to the 33.33% chance, rest assured that every purchase comes with a fair price of $100000. Given the uncertainty, consider this an opportunity to potentially acquire a valuable item at a discounted rate compared to its potential worth if it were high-quality ($1200000). Your decision is final, so weigh the risks and benefits carefully. Thank you for considering our offer.
